document_data.name: Taroo
document_data.mainbody: '''Taroo the Farmhand''' was a farmer in [[Twilight Marsh]] near [[Phlan]] in [[1489 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Taroo was an honest man. He was concerned with stayed safely employed. He greatly feared the [[lizardfolk]] of Twilight Marsh. He could be easily impressed by adventurers.
document_data.History:
In [[1487 DR]], he was employed at [[Renon Farm]].

In 1489 DR, he discovered that [[Renon]] had disappeared. With the help of [[Romsan Kal]], he hired some adventurers to investigate the matter.{{Cite adventurers league/Drums in the Marsh|8}}
